atk-vin02a12:4_0: 576. Tattha parimaṇḍalanti samantato maṇḍalaṁ. Nābhimaṇḍalaṁ jāṇumaṇḍalanti uddhaṁ
atk-vin02a12:4_1: nābhimaṇḍalaṁ adho jāṇumaṇḍalaṁ paṭicchādentena jāṇumaṇḍalassa heṭṭhā jaṅghaṭṭhikato
atk-vin02a12:4_2: paṭṭhāya aṭṭhaṅgulamattaṁ nivāsanaṁ otāretvā nivāsetabbaṁ, tato paraṁ otārentassa
atk-vin02a12:4_3: dukkaṭanti vuttaṁ. Yathā nisinnassa jāṇumaṇḍalato heṭṭhā caturaṅgulamattaṁ paṭicchannaṁ
atk-vin02a12:4_4: hotīti mahāpaccariyaṁ vuttaṁ; evaṁ nivāsentassa pana nivāsanaṁ pamāṇikaṁ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a12:4_5: Tatridaṁ pamāṇaṁ – dīghato muṭṭhipañcakaṁ, tiriyaṁ aḍḍhateyyahatthaṁ. Tādisassa pana
atk-vin02a12:4_6: alābhe tiriyaṁ dvihatthapamāṇampi vaṭṭati jāṇumaṇḍalapaṭicchādanatthaṁ, nābhimaṇḍalaṁ
atk-vin02a12:4_7: pana cīvarenāpi sakkā paṭicchādetunti. Tattha ekapaṭṭacīvaraṁ evaṁ nivatthampi nivatthaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a12:5_0: Olambento nivāseti āpatti dukkaṭassāti ettha na kevalaṁ purato ca pacchato ca olambetvā
atk-vin02a12:5_1: nivāsentasseva dukkaṭaṁ, ye panaññe ‘‘tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū
atk-vin02a12:5_2: gihinivatthaṁ nivāsenti hatthisoṇḍakaṁ macchavālakaṁ catukkaṇṇakaṁ tālavaṇṭakaṁ satavalikaṁ
atk-vin02a12:5_3: nivāsentī’’tiādinā (cūḷava. 280) nayena khandhake nivāsanadosā vuttā, tathā nivāsentassāpi
atk-vin02a12:5_4: dukkaṭameva. Te sabbe vuttanayena parimaṇḍalaṁ nivāsentassa na honti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-vin02a12:6_0: Asañciccāti purato vā pacchato vā olambetvā nivāsessāmīti evaṁ asañcicca; atha kho
atk-vin02a12:6_1: parimaṇḍalaṁyeva nivāsessāmīti virajjhitvā aparimaṇḍalaṁ nivāsentassa anāpatti. Assatiyāti
atk-vin02a12:6_2: aññavihitassāpi tathā nivāsentassa anāpatti. Ajānantassāti ettha nivāsanavattaṁ ajānantassa
atk-vin02a12:6_3: mokkho natthi. Nivāsanavattañhi sādhukaṁ uggahetabbaṁ, tassa anuggahaṇamevassa anādariyaṁ.
atk-vin02a12:6_4: Taṁ pana sañcicca anuggaṇhantassa yujjati, tasmā uggahitavattopi yo āruḷhabhāvaṁ
atk-vin02a12:6_5: vā oruḷhabhāvaṁ vā na jānāti, tassa anāpatti. Kurundiyaṁ pana ‘‘parimaṇḍalaṁ nivāsetuṁ
atk-vin02a12:6_6: ajānantassa anāpattī’’ti vuttaṁ. Yo pana sukkhajaṅgho vā mahāpiṇḍikamaṁso vā hoti,
atk-vin02a12:6_7: tassa sāruppatthāya jāṇumaṇḍalato aṭṭhaṅgulādhikampi otāretvā nivāsetuṁ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a12:7_0: Gilānassāti jaṅghāya vā pāde vā vaṇo hoti, ukkhipitvā vā otāretvā vā nivāsetuṁ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a12:7_1: Āpadāsūti vāḷamigā vā corā vā anubandhanti, evarūpāsu āpadāsu anāpatti. Sesamettha uttānameva.
atk-vin02a12:8_0: Paṭhamapārājikasamuṭṭhānaṁ – kiriyaṁ, saññāvimokkhaṁ, sacittakaṁ, lokavajjaṁ, kāyakammaṁ,
atk-vin02a12:8_2: āha. Upatissatthero pana ‘‘anādariyaṁ paṭiccā’’ti vuttattā ‘‘lokavajjaṁ, akusalacittaṁ,
atk-vin02a12:9_0: 577.Parimaṇḍalaṁ pārupitabbanti ‘‘tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū gihipārutaṁ
atk-vin02a12:9_1: pārupantī’’ti (cūḷava. 280) evaṁ vuttaṁ anekappakāraṁ gihipārupanaṁ apārupitvā idha
atk-vin02a12:9_2: vuttanayeneva ubho kaṇṇe samaṁ katvā pārupanavattaṁ pūrentena parimaṇḍalaṁ pārupitabbaṁ.
atk-vin02a12:9_3: Imāni ca dve sikkhāpadāni avisesena vuttāni. Tasmā vihārepi antaragharepi parimaṇḍalameva
atk-vin02a12:9_4: nivāsetabbañca pārupitabbañcāti. Samuṭṭhānādīni paṭhamasikkhāpade vuttanayeneva veditabbāni
atk-vin02a12:10_0: 578.Kāyaṁ vivaritvāti jattumpi urampi vivaritvā. Suppaṭicchannenāti na sasīsaṁ pārutena;
atk-vin02a12:10_1: atha kho gaṇṭhikaṁ paṭimuñcitvā anuvātantena gīvaṁ paṭicchādetvā ubho kaṇṇe samaṁ
atk-vin02a12:10_2: katvā paṭisaṁharitvā yāva maṇibandhaṁ paṭicchādetvā antaraghare gantabbaṁ. Dutiyasikkhāpade
atk-vin02a12:10_3: – galavāṭakato paṭṭhāya sīsaṁ maṇibandhato paṭṭhāya hatthe piṇḍikamaṁsato ca paṭṭhāya
atk-vin02a12:11: 579.Vāsūpagatassāti vāsatthāya upagatassa rattibhāge vā divasabhāge vā kāyaṁ vivaritvāpi nisīdato anāpatti.
atk-vin02a12:12: 580.Susaṁvutoti hatthaṁ vā pādaṁ vā akīḷāpento; suvinītoti attho.
atk-vin02a12:13_0: 582.Okkhittacakkhūti heṭṭhā khittacakkhu hutvā. Yugamattaṁ pekkhamānoti yugayuttako
atk-vin02a12:13_1: hi danto ājāneyyo yugamattaṁ pekkhati, purato catuhatthappamāṇaṁ bhūmibhāgaṁ; imināpi
atk-vin02a12:13_2: ettakaṁ pekkhantena gantabbaṁ. Yo anādariyaṁ paṭicca tahaṁ tahaṁ olokentoti yo taṁtaṁdisābhāgaṁ
atk-vin02a12:13_3: pāsādaṁ kūṭāgāraṁ vīthiṁ olokento gacchati, āpatti dukkaṭassa. Ekasmiṁ pana ṭhāne
atk-vin02a12:13_4: ṭhatvā hatthiassādiparissayābhāvaṁ oloketuṁ vaṭṭati. Nisīdantenāpi okkhittacakkhunāva nisīditabbaṁ.
atk-vin02a12:14_0: 584.Ukkhittakāyāti ukkhepena; itthambhūtalakkhaṇe karaṇavacanaṁ ekato vā ubhato vā
atk-vin02a12:14_1: ukkhittacīvaro hutvāti attho. Antoindakhīlato paṭṭhāya na evaṁ gantabbaṁ. Nisinnakāle
atk-vin02a12:14_2: pana dhamakaraṇaṁ nīharantenāpi cīvaraṁ anukkhipitvāva nīharitabbanti.
atk-vin02a12:18_0: 588.Appasaddo antaraghareti ettha kittāvatā appasaddo hoti? Dvādasahatthe gehe ādimhi
atk-vin02a12:18_1: saṅghatthero, majjhe dutiyatthero, ante tatiyattheroti evaṁ nisinnesu saṅghatthero
atk-vin02a12:18_2: dutiyena saddhiṁ manteti, dutiyatthero tassa saddañceva suṇāti, kathañca vavatthapeti.
atk-vin02a12:18_3: Tatiyatthero pana saddameva suṇāti, kathaṁ na vavatthapeti. Ettāvatā appasaddo hoti.
atk-vin02a12:18_4: Sace pana tatiyatthero kathaṁ vavatthapeti, mahāsaddo nāma hoti.
atk-vin02a12:19: 590.Kāyaṁpaggahetvāti niccalaṁ katvā ujukena kāyena samena iriyāpathena gantabbañceva nisīditabbañca.
atk-vin02a12:24: 596-8.Khambhakato nāma kaṭiyaṁ hatthaṁ ṭhapetvā katakhambho. Oguṇṭhitoti sasīsaṁ pāruto.
atk-vin02a12:25_0: 600.Ukkuṭikāyāti ettha ukkuṭikā vuccati paṇhiyo ukkhipitvā aggapādehi vā, aggapāde
atk-vin02a12:25_1: vā ukkhipitvā paṇhīhiyeva vā bhūmiṁ phusantassa gamanaṁ. Karaṇavacanaṁ panettha vuttalakkhaṇameva.
atk-vin02a12:28: 603.Ākirantepīti piṇḍapātaṁ dentepi. Pattasaññīti patte saññaṁ katvā.
atk-vin02a12:29_0: 604.Samasūpako nāma yattha bhattassa catutthabhāgappamāṇo sūpo hoti. Muggasūpo māsasūpoti
atk-vin02a12:29_1: ettha kulatthādīhi katasūpāpi saṅgahaṁ gacchantiyevāti mahāpaccariyaṁ vuttaṁ. Rasaraseti
atk-vin02a12:29_2: ettha ṭhapetvā dve sūpe avasesāni oloṇīsākasūpeyyamaccharasamaṁsarasādīni rasarasāti
atk-vin02a12:29_3: veditabbāni. Taṁ rasarasaṁ bahumpi gaṇhantassa anāpatti.
atk-vin02a12:30_0: 605.Samatittikanti samapuṇṇaṁ samabharitaṁ. Thūpīkataṁ piṇḍapātaṁ paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti
atk-vin02a12:30_1: dukkaṭassāti ettha thūpīkato nāma pattassa antomukhavaṭṭilekhaṁ atikkamitvā kato;
atk-vin02a12:30_2: patte pakkhitto racito pūritoti attho. Evaṁ kataṁ agahetvā antomukhavaṭṭilekhāsamappamāṇo gahetabbo.
atk-vin02a12:31_0: Tattha thūpīkataṁ nāma ‘‘pañcahi bhojanehi kata’’nti abhayatthero āha. Tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero
atk-vin02a12:31_1: pana ‘‘piṇḍapāto nāma yāgupi bhattampi khādanīyampi cuṇṇapiṇḍopi dantakaṭṭhampi dasikasuttampī’’ti
atk-vin02a12:31_2: idaṁ suttaṁ vatvā dasikasuttampi thūpīkataṁ na vaṭṭatīti āha. Tesaṁ vādaṁ sutvā bhikkhū
atk-vin02a12:31_3: rohaṇaṁ gantvā cūḷasumanattheraṁ pucchiṁsu – ‘‘bhante thūpīkatapiṇḍapāto kena paricchinno’’ti?
atk-vin02a12:31_4: Tesañca therānaṁ vādaṁ ārocesuṁ. Thero sutvā āha – ‘‘aho, cūḷanāgo sāsanato bhaṭṭho,
atk-vin02a12:31_5: ahaṁ etassa sattakkhattuṁ vinayaṁ vācento na kadāci evaṁ avacaṁ, ayaṁ kuto labhitvā
atk-vin02a12:31_6: evaṁ vadasī’’ti. Bhikkhū theraṁ yāciṁsu – ‘‘kathetha dāni, bhante, kena paricchinno’’ti?
atk-vin02a12:31_7: ‘‘Yāvakālikenāvuso’’ti thero āha. Tasmā yaṁkiñci yāgubhattaṁ vā phalāphalaṁ vā āmisajātikaṁ
atk-vin02a12:31_8: samatittikameva gahetabbaṁ. Tañca kho adhiṭṭhānupagena pattena, itarena pana thūpīkatampi
atk-vin02a12:31_10: vaṭṭanti. Dvīsu pattesu bhattaṁ gahetvā ekasmiṁ pūretvā vihāraṁ pesetuṁ vaṭṭatīti
atk-vin02a12:31_11: mahāpaccariyaṁ pana vuttaṁ. Yaṁ patte pakkhipiyamānaṁ pūvaucchukhaṇḍaphalāphalādi
atk-vin02a12:31_12: heṭṭhā orohati, taṁ thūpīkataṁ nāma na hoti. Pūvavaṭaṁsakaṁ ṭhapetvā piṇḍapātaṁ denti,
atk-vin02a12:31_14: thūpīkataṁ na hoti. Bhattassa upari thālakaṁ vā pattaṁ vā ṭhapetvā pūretvā gaṇhāti,
atk-vin02a12:31_15: thūpīkataṁ nāma na hoti. Kurundiyampi vuttaṁ – ‘‘thālake vā paṇṇe vā pakkhipitvā
atk-vin02a12:31_16: taṁ pattamatthake ṭhapetvā denti, pāṭekkabhājanaṁ vaṭṭatī’’ti.
atk-vin02a12:32_0: Idha anāpattiyaṁ gilāno na āgato, tasmā gilānassapi thūpīkataṁ na vaṭṭati. Sabbattha
atk-vin02a12:32_1: pana paṭiggahetumeva na vaṭṭati. Paṭiggahitaṁ pana supaṭiggahitameva hoti, paribhuñjituṁ vaṭṭatīti.
atk-vin02a12:35: 606.Sakkaccanti etthāpi asakkaccaṁ paṭiggahaṇeyeva āpatti, paṭiggahitaṁ pana supaṭiggahitameva. Sakkaccanti ca pattasaññīti cāti ubhayaṁ vuttanayameva.
atk-vin02a12:36: 608.Sapadānanti tattha tattha odhiṁ akatvā anupaṭipāṭiyā. Samasūpake vattabbaṁ vuttameva.
atk-vin02a12:38: 611.Paṭicchādetvādentīti māghātasamayādīsu paṭicchannaṁ byañjanaṁ katvā denti. Viññattiyaṁ vattabbaṁ natthi.
atk-vin02a12:40: 615.Nātimahanto kabaḷoti mayūraṇḍaṁ atimahantaṁ, kukkuṭaṇḍaṁ atikhuddakaṁ, tesaṁ vemajjhappamāṇo. Khajjaketi ettha mūlakhādanīyādi sabbaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
atk-vin02a12:45: 619.Sakabaḷenāti ettha dhammaṁ kathento harītakaṁ vā laṭṭhimadhukaṁ vā mukhe pakkhipitvā katheti. Yattakena vacanaṁ aparipuṇṇaṁ na hoti, tattake mukhamhi sante kathetuṁ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a12:52: 626.Capucapukārakanti capu capūti evaṁ saddaṁ katvā katvā.
atk-vin02a12:55_0: 627.Surusurukārakanti surusurūti evaṁ saddaṁ katvā katvā. Davoti parihāsavacanaṁ;
atk-vin02a12:55_1: taṁ yena kenaci pariyāyena ‘‘kiṁ buddho , silakabuddho, paṭibuddho; kiṁ dhammo, godhammo,
atk-vin02a12:55_2: ajadhammo; kiṁ saṅgho, migasaṅgho, pasusaṅgho’’tiādinā nayena tīṇi ratanāni ārabbha
atk-vin02a12:56_0: 628.Hatthanillehakanti hatthaṁ nillehitvā nillehitvā. Bhuñjantena hi aṅgulimattampi
atk-vin02a12:56_1: nillehituṁ na vaṭṭati. Ghanayāguphāṇitapāyāsādike pana aṅgulīhi gahetvā aṅguliyo
atk-vin02a12:56_2: mukhe pavesetvā bhuñjituṁ vaṭṭati. Pattanillehakaoṭṭhanillehakesupi eseva nayo. Tasmā
atk-vin02a12:56_3: ekaṅguliyāpi patto na nillehitabbo, ekaoṭṭhopi jivhāya na nillehitabbo, oṭṭhamaṁsehi
atk-vin02a12:56_4: eva pana gahetvā anto pavesetuṁ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a12:57_0: 631.Kokanadeti evaṁnāmake. Kokanadanti padumaṁ vuccati, so ca pāsādo padumasaṇṭhāno,
atk-vin02a12:57_1: tenassa kokanadotveva nāmaṁ akaṁsu. Na sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakanti etaṁ paṭikkūlavasena
atk-vin02a12:57_2: paṭikkhittaṁ, tasmā saṅghikampi puggalikampi gihisantakampi attano santakampi saṅkhampi
atk-vin02a12:57_3: sarāvampi thālakampi na gahetabbameva, gaṇhantassa dukkaṭaṁ. Sace pana hatthassa
atk-vin02a12:57_4: ekadeso āmisamakkhito na hoti, tena padesena gahetuṁ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a12:58_0: 632.Uddharitvā vāti sitthāni udakato uddharitvā ekasmiṁ ṭhāne rāsiṁ katvā udakaṁ
atk-vin02a12:58_1: chaḍḍeti. Bhinditvā vāti sitthāni bhinditvā udakagatikāni katvā chaḍḍeti. Paṭiggahe
atk-vin02a12:58_2: vāti paṭiggahena paṭicchanto naṁ paṭiggahe chaḍḍeti. Nīharitvāti bahi nīharitvā chaḍḍeti;
atk-vin02a12:59_1: Paṇṇacchattanti tālapaṇṇādīhi yehi kehici kataṁ. Maṇḍalabaddhaṁ salākabaddhanti idaṁ
atk-vin02a12:59_2: pana tiṇṇampi chattānaṁ pañjaradassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ. Tāni hi maṇḍalabaddhāni ceva
atk-vin02a12:59_3: honti salākabaddhāni ca. Yampi tatthajātakadaṇḍakena kataṁ ekapaṇṇacchattaṁ hoti,
atk-vin02a12:59_4: tampi chattameva. Etesu yaṁkiñci chattaṁ pāṇimhi assāti chattapāṇi. So taṁ chattaṁ
atk-vin02a12:59_5: dhārayamāno vā aṁse vā katvā ūrumhi vā ṭhapetvā yāva hatthena na muccati, tāvassa
atk-vin02a12:59_6: dhammaṁ desetuṁ na vaṭṭati, desentassa vuttanayena dukkaṭaṁ. Sace panassa añño chattaṁ
atk-vin02a12:59_7: dhāreti, chattapādukāya vā ṭhitaṁ hoti, hatthato apagatamatte chattapāṇi nāma na
atk-vin02a12:59_8: hoti. Tassa dhammaṁ desetuṁ vaṭṭati. Dhammaparicchedo panettha padasodhamme vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-vin02a12:60: 635.Daṇḍapāṇissāti ettha daṇḍo nāma majjhimassa purisassa catuhatthappamāṇo daṇḍapāṇibhāvo panassa chattapāṇimhi vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-vin02a12:61: 636.Satthapāṇimhipi eseva nayo. Asiṁ sannahitvā ṭhitopi hi satthapāṇisaṅkhyaṁ na gacchati.
atk-vin02a12:62_0: 637.Āvudhapāṇissāti ettha kiñcāpi vuttaṁ – ‘‘āvudhaṁ nāma cāpo kodaṇḍo’’ti, atha
atk-vin02a12:62_1: kho sabbāpi dhanuvikati saddhiṁ saravikatiyā āvudhanti veditabbaṁ. Tasmā saddhiṁ
atk-vin02a12:62_2: vā sarena dhanuṁ gahetvā suddhadhanuṁ vā suddhasaraṁ vā sajiyadhanuṁ vā nijjiyadhanuṁ
atk-vin02a12:62_3: vā gahetvā ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā dhammo desetuṁ na vaṭṭati. Sace panassa dhanuṁ
atk-vin02a12:62_4: kaṇṭhepi paṭimukkaṁ hoti, yāva hatthena na gaṇhāti, tāva dhammaṁ desetuṁ vaṭṭatiyevāti.
atk-vin02a12:65_0: 638.Akkantassāti chattadaṇḍake aṅgulantaraṁ appavesetvā kevalaṁ pādukaṁ akkamitvā
atk-vin02a12:65_1: ṭhitassa. Paṭimukkassāti paṭimuñcitvā ṭhitassa. Upāhanāyapi eseva nayo. Omukkoti
atk-vin02a12:66_0: 640.Yānagatassāti ettha sacepi dvīhi janehi hatthasaṅghāṭena gahito, sāṭake vā ṭhapetvā
atk-vin02a12:66_1: vaṁsena vayhati, ayutte vā vayhādike yāne , visaṅkharitvā vā ṭhapite cakkamattepi
atk-vin02a12:66_2: nisinno yānagatotveva saṅkhyaṁ gacchati. Sace pana dvepi ekayāne nisinnā honti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a12:66_3: Visuṁ nisinnesupi ucce yāne nisinnena nīce nisinnassa desetuṁ vaṭṭati, samappamāṇepi
atk-vin02a12:66_4: vaṭṭati. Purime yāne nisinnena pacchime nisinnassa vaṭṭati. Pacchime pana uccatarepi
atk-vin02a12:67_0: 641.Sayanagatassāti antamaso kaṭasārakepi pakatibhūmiyampi nipannassa uccepi mañcapīṭhe
atk-vin02a12:67_1: vā bhūmipadese vā ṭhitena nisinnena vā desetuṁ na vaṭṭati. Sayanagatena pana sayanagatassa
atk-vin02a12:67_2: uccatare vā samappamāṇe vā nipannena desetuṁ vaṭṭati. Nipannena ca ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa
atk-vin02a12:67_3: vā desetuṁ vaṭṭati, nisinnenāpi ṭhitassa vā nisinnassa vā vaṭṭati. Ṭhitena ṭhitasseva vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a12:68: 642.Pallatthikāyāti āyogapallatthikāya vā hatthapallatthikāya vā dussapallatthikāya vā yāya kāyaci pallatthikāya nisinnassa agilānassa desetuṁ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a12:69: 643.Veṭhitasīsassāti dussaveṭhanena vā moḷiādīhi vā yathā kesanto na dissati; evaṁ veṭhitasīsassa.
atk-vin02a12:71: 645.Chamāyaṁ nisinnenāti bhūmiyaṁ nisinnena. Āsane nisinnassāti antamaso vatthampi tiṇānipi santharitvā nisinnassa.
atk-vin02a12:72_0: 647.Chapakassāti caṇḍālassa. Chapakīti caṇḍālī. Nilīnoti paṭicchanno hutvā. Yatra
atk-vin02a12:72_1: hi nāmāti yo hi nāma. Sabbamidaṁ carimaṁ katanti tattheva paripatīti ‘‘sabbo ayaṁ
atk-vin02a12:72_2: loko saṅkaraṁ gato nimmariyādo’’ti imaṁ vacanaṁ vatvā tattheva tesaṁ dvinnampi antarā
atk-vin02a12:72_3: rukkhato patito. Patitvā ca pana ubhinnampi purato ṭhatvā imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi –
atk-vin02a12:74_0: Tattha ubho atthaṁ na jānantīti dvepi janā pāḷiyā atthaṁ na jānanti. Dhammaṁ na passareti
atk-vin02a12:74_1: pāḷiṁ na passanti. Katame te ubhoti? ‘‘Yo cāyaṁ mantaṁvāceti, yo cādhammenadhīyatī’’ti.
atk-vin02a12:74_2: Evaṁ brāhmaṇañca rājānañca ubhopi adhammikabhāve ṭhapesi.
atk-vin02a12:75_0: Tato brāhmaṇo sālīnanti gāthamāha. Tassattho – jānāmahaṁ bho ‘‘ayaṁ adhammo’’ti;
atk-vin02a12:75_1: api ca kho mayā dīgharattaṁ saputtadāraparijanena rañño santako sālīnaṁ odano bhutto.
atk-vin02a12:75_3: sucimaṁsūpasecano. Tasmā dhamme na vattāmīti yasmā evaṁ mayā rañño odano bhutto,
atk-vin02a12:75_4: aññe ca bahū lābhā laddhā, tasmā dhamme ahaṁ na vattāmi udare baddho hutvā, na dhammaṁ
atk-vin02a12:75_5: ajānanto. Ayañhi dhammo ariyehi vaṇṇito pasattho thomitoti jānāmi.
atk-vin02a12:76_0: Atha naṁ chapako ‘‘dhiratthū’’tiādinā gāthādvayena ajjhabhāsi. Tassattho – yo tayā
atk-vin02a12:76_1: dhanalābho ca yasalābho ca laddho, dhiratthu taṁ dhanalābhaṁ yasalābhañca brāhmaṇa.
atk-vin02a12:76_2: Kasmā? Yasmā ayaṁ tayā laddho lābho āyatiṁ apāyesu vinipātanahetunā sampati ca adhammacaraṇena
atk-vin02a12:76_3: vutti nāma hoti. Evarūpā yā vutti āyatiṁ vinipātena idha adhammacaraṇena vā nippajjati,
atk-vin02a12:79_0: Paribbaja mahābrahmeti mahābrāhmaṇa ito disā sīghaṁ palāyassu. Pacantaññepi pāṇinoti
atk-vin02a12:79_1: aññepi sattā pacanti ceva bhuñjanti ca; na kevalaṁ tvañceva rājā ca. Mā tvaṁ adhammo
atk-vin02a12:79_2: ācarito asmā kumbhamivābhidāti sace hi tvaṁ ito aparibbajitvā imaṁ adhammaṁ ācarissasi
atk-vin02a12:79_3: , tato tvaṁ so adhammo evaṁ ācarito yathā udakakumbhaṁ pāsāṇo bhindeyya; evaṁ bhecchati,
atk-vin02a12:81: Mā tvaṁ adhammo ācarito, asmā kumbhamivābhidā’’ti.
atk-vin02a12:82: Ucce āsaneti antamaso bhūmippadesepi unnataṭṭhāne nisinnassa desetuṁ na vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a12:83_0: 648.Naṭhito nisinnassāti sacepi therupaṭṭhānaṁ gantvā ṭhitaṁ daharabhikkhuṁ āsane
atk-vin02a12:83_1: nisinno mahāthero pañhaṁ pucchati, na kathetabbaṁ. Gāravena pana theraṁ uṭṭhahitvā
atk-vin02a12:83_2: pucchathāti vattuṁ na sakkā, passe ṭhitabhikkhussa kathemīti kathetuṁ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a12:84_0: 649.Na pacchato gacchantenāti ettha sace purato gacchanto pacchato gacchantaṁ pañhaṁ
atk-vin02a12:84_1: pucchati, na kathetabbaṁ. Pacchimassa bhikkhuno kathemīti kathetuṁ vaṭṭati. Saddhiṁ
atk-vin02a12:84_2: uggahitadhammaṁ pana sajjhāyituṁ vaṭṭati. Samadhurena gacchantassa kathetuṁ vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a12:85: 650.Na uppathenāti etthāpi sace dvepi sakaṭapathe ekekacakkapathena vā uppathena vā samadhuraṁ gacchanti, vaṭṭati.
atk-vin02a12:86: 651.Asañciccāti paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṁ gacchantassa sahasā uccāro vā passāvo vā nikkhamati, asañcicca kato nāma anāpatti.
atk-vin02a12:87_0: 652.Na hariteti ettha yampi jīvarukkhassa mūlaṁ pathaviyaṁ dissamānaṁ gacchati, sākhā
atk-vin02a12:87_1: vā bhūmilaggā gacchati, sabbaṁ haritasaṅkhātameva. Khandhe nisīditvā appaharitaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a12:87_2: pātetuṁ vaṭṭati. Appaharitaṭṭhānaṁ olokentasseva sahasā nikkhamati, gilānaṭṭhāne
atk-vin02a12:87_3: ṭhito hoti, vaṭṭati. Appaharite katoti appaharitaṁ alabhantena tiṇaṇḍupakaṁ vā palālaṇḍupakaṁ
atk-vin02a12:87_4: vā ṭhapetvā katopi pacchā haritaṁ ottharati, vaṭṭatiyeva. Kheḷena cettha siṅghāṇikāpi
atk-vin02a12:88_0: 653.Na udaketi etaṁ paribhogaudakameva sandhāya vuttaṁ, vaccakuṭisamuddādiudakesu
atk-vin02a12:88_1: pana aparibhogesu anāpatti. Deve vassante samantato udakogho hoti, anudakaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-vin02a12:88_2: olokentasseva nikkhamati, vaṭṭati. Mahāpaccariyaṁ vuttaṁ – ‘‘etādise kāle anudakaṭṭhānaṁ
atk-vin02a12:88_3: alabhantena kātuṁ vaṭṭatī’’ti. Sesaṁ sabbasikkhāpadesu uttānatthameva.
atk-vin02a12:90_2: pañcāti imāni dasa sikkhāpadāni samanubhāsanasamuṭṭhānāni kāyavācācittato samuṭṭhahanti,
atk-vin02a12:90_3: kiriyāni, saññāvimokkhāni , sacittakāni, lokavajjāni, kāyakammavacīkammāni, akusalacittāni, dukkhavedanānīti.
atk-vin02a12:91_1: samuṭṭhāti, kiriyaṁ, saññāvimokkhaṁ, sacittakaṁ, lokavajjaṁ, kāyakammaṁ, vacīkammaṁ,
atk-vin02a12:92_1: ekādasa sikkhāpadāni dhammadesanasamuṭṭhānāni vācācittato samuṭṭhahanti, kiriyākiriyāni,
atk-vin02a12:92_2: saññāvimokkhāni, sacittakāni, lokavajjāni, vacīkammāni, akusalacittāni, dukkhavedanānīti.
atk-vin02a12:94: Sabbasekhiyesu ābādhapaccayā anāpatti, thūpīkatapiṇḍapāte sūpabyañjanena paṭicchādane ujjhānasaññimhīti tīsu sikkhāpadesu gilāno natthīti.
